# I successfully harvested 10 units of coal, and my inventory now contains coal. 
# Next, I need to create a furnace to smelt ores and a mining drill to gather more resources.

# 4. Check if I have the necessary materials to craft a Stone Furnace.
furnace_recipe = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.StoneFurnace)
print(f"Furnace Recipe: {furnace_recipe}")

# 5. Ensure I have the materials to craft the furnace.
ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace) 

# 6. Now, I will place the furnace at my current position.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=current_position)  # Assuming current_position is defined. 

# 7. Next, I need to craft a Burner Mining Drill to start gathering more resources.
ensure_craftable(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)

# 8. Place the Burner Mining Drill next to the coal resource.
drill = place_entity_next_to(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, reference_position=furnace.position, direction=Direction.RIGHT)  # Assuming furnace.position is valid. 

# 9. Finally, I should insert coal into the furnace to fuel it.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Fuel the furnace for smelting. 

# 10. Check the inventory again to confirm the changes.
print(f"Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
